summary: Audio Caller feature testing complete. All backend APIs and frontend UI working correctly. CreateUserGame shows two game modes (Digital Tickets and Audio Caller), audio-only games can be created with custom call_interval, poll endpoints work for both authenticated users and public viewers, and AudioCaller page displays number board with host controls.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/user-games creates digital game with audio_only=false
Backend: POST /api/user-games creates audio-only game with audio_only=true
Backend: audio_only and call_interval fields stored correctly
Backend: Default call_interval is 8 seconds
Backend: GET /api/user-games/{id}/poll returns lightweight polling data
Backend: GET /api/user-games/share/{code}/poll works without authentication
Backend: Poll endpoints return status, audio_only, call_interval, total_called, new_numbers, all_called_numbers, current_number, has_changes
Backend: Delta updates work correctly with last_count parameter
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/start starts game
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/call-number calls next number
Backend: POST /api/user-games/{id}/end ends game
Backend: Poll returns 404 for non-existent game
Backend: Poll returns 404 for invalid share code
Frontend: CreateUserGame page shows two game modes (Digital Tickets and Audio Caller)
Frontend: Selecting Audio Caller mode shows 'Audio Caller Settings' section
Frontend: Call Interval (seconds) input visible in audio mode with default value 8
Frontend: Number of Tickets and Select Prizes hidden in audio mode
Frontend: Creating audio game navigates to /audio-caller/{userGameId}
Frontend: AudioCaller page shows number board (10x9 grid of 1-90)
Frontend: AudioCaller page shows current ball with call name
Frontend: AudioCaller page shows Called/Remaining stats
Frontend: Host controls visible: Start Game, Auto Call, Call Next, End
Frontend: Auto Call toggles to Pause when running
Frontend: Share button and Share Code visible for host
Frontend: Public viewer route /audio-view/{shareCode} works without auth

context_for_next_testing_agent: Audio Caller feature fully tested. Key endpoints: POST /api/user-games (with audio_only=true, call_interval), GET /api/user-games/{id}/poll, GET /api/user-games/share/{code}/poll. Frontend routes: /create-game (shows game mode selector), /audio-caller/{userGameId} (host view), /audio-view/{shareCode} (public viewer). Poll endpoints support delta updates via last_count parameter. Default call_interval is 8 seconds.
